title: Typing Tutor Game
description: Enhanced a multithreaded educational 'Typing Tutor' game coded in Java to incorporate thread synchronization and additional features.

title: Image filter(blurr)
description: Implemented parallel algorithms for smoothing RGB color images using mean and median filters. Experimentally benchmarked the algorithms across different image and filter sizes to determine optimal parallelization conditions.

title: Weather Comparison App
description: A Python application built with Tkinter that allows users to compare weather between two cities. It fetches weather data from the OpenWeatherMap API and displays the temperature and description for each city.
